metadata.title: CVE-2024-26930 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: scsi:qla2xxx: Fix double free of the ha->vp_map pointer Coverity scan reportedpotential risk of double free of the pointer ha->vp_map. ha->vp_map wasfreed in qla2x00_mem_alloc(), and again freed in functionqla2x00_mem_free(ha). Assign NULL to vp_map and kfree take care of NULL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26930` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.11.0-7-generic - 6.11.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-7-generic - 6.11.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-7-generic-64k - 6.11.0-7.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1002-aws - 6.11.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1003-azure - 6.11.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1001-gcp - 6.11.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1002-lowlatency - 6.11.0-1002.2
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1002-lowlatency-64k - 6.11.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1004-oracle - 6.11.0-1004.4
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-1004-oracle-64k - 6.11.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-6.11.0-1003-raspi - 6.11.0-1003.3
No subscription required
